Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Alright. Your turn.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What? That was quick! I thought we were swapping every half an hour!'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Yeah. That was half an hour.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Sigh. Fine. I guess pushing the car is less tiring now with this money.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Noctis will definitely overspend.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Impossible! I'm the best at managing finances!"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Sure. You can keep the money, then. Make sure to double it in 3 months.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Right. If I lend it with an interest rate of 70%...'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Don't worry. I'll throw away the trash Noctis has in the lounge when he is in jail."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Will I get court-martialed for this?'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't think financial crimes apply to Constructs... but I don't remember for sure. Give it a shot, and we'll find out."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Simply put, don't get too hung up with this bounty. Save it for the inevitable future when you need to clean up your mess."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Hmm... The car is much lighter after Noctis got out.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's because of my muscles! Muscles!"}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Unlike you, whose claws are heavier than your brain!'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But claws tear muscles apart!'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Ha! Is that a challenge?'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What is this? Kill one, lose one free? Sounds good to me.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, Captain! How far away are we from the extraction point?'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I don't want to push anymore."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's see... We'll be there after this part of the no man's land. Another 30 km or so."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "We've completed our mission already! Why is it still so exhausting?!"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'It is a sunny day—a little too sunny, perhaps. The sun shines blatantly upon the asphalt road that lies within hundreds of miles of deserted fields and sands.'}
{3: 'The physical conditions of humans have determined that such an environment is not ideal for their survival. However, this place is a paradise for some other life forms.'}
{3: 'Lizards, bharals, hares, wolves, the flying vultures...'}
{3: '...And the members of Cerberus, who are pushing their car on an endless highway.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'This film thing looked kind of blurry.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I still looked pretty handsome, though!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'So... he shot this during the journey?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I guess.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Dammit. Is this violating my image rights?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I saw him hold up his camera occasionally. So this is what he was recording.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh, by the way...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What happened to the money in the end? The bounty?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I know we happened to take care of that thug from the mechanic's shop, but this money still counts as illegal income to Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...I can't believe we took care of our mission target right at the beginning.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'That bedridden commandant must be bored. Sending us to take care of some bully on the surface?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'We have to do all the dirty work—', 4: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Vera suddenly gives Noctis a kick.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Be glad you're not locked up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Fine. At least we got the bounty.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You were paid by a bunch of Scavengers who were not Babylonia citizens. Sure, you can spend it, but it'll land you in jail, like No. 21 said.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want a new audiovisual terminal.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Sure, fine. We'll have to find a way to legitimize the money first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What if we invest in WGAA for some grenades?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "No one's going to willingly lose their money like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What about movies? Didn't 21 say something about a movie with a red motorcycle?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I'm kind of interested.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '"Light"? Beardy told me that\'s the name of the movie.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It's an old movie. I wonder if they can find it.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The new audiovisual terminal I want may have this movie on it.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'As she says that, No. 21 takes out the film roll from the projector and examines it in detail.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Be careful. We borrowed it from WGAA.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'The people there said they stopped producing films like this decades ago. The machine itself is pretty expensive as well.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'While No. 21 curiously looks at her own images on the film, a note falls quietly from the tin box holding the roll.'}
{1: "I don't know where you are now. I bet you'll be back on Babylonia at some point.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "So I feel like it's safer to send this film to Babylonia.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Although I still have to lie in this clinic for a while, the doctor in the settlement said I should be able to get back on my feet soon.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I still have a job to do, after all.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I took the opportunity to finish editing this footage.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I've been recording every now and then with my camera ever since I met you.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'My editing is pretty shit.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: "I'm bad at critiquing movies, and I'm bad at making them, too.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But... I think the most important thing is to "see."', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's already very impressive that I can record what I've experienced.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I think this is the best gift I can offer you.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Oh. One more thing.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I never told you how that movie ended.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "The knight reached the top of the tower, but he didn't find any relics.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But the gods gave him a spark of hope and told him the catastrophe would pass one day.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'Golden crops would cover the land again, and the sun would brighten the sky once more.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's a cheesy ending, but it's a good ending as well.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Perhaps I wanted to live because of Zack and this movie.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Anyway... Thank you.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "As for the film in your hands, I've privately given it a name.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "That's all. I have to keep going and try to find the old fella's daughter.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Perhaps we'll see each other again in a conservation area one day.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'With plenty of whisky and movies.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'Wait. The doctor just told me you paid for my medical bill with the bounty?', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Goddammit. How many more times do I have to owe you?!', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '—For Cerberus', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '"The Meandering Three"', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Beardy', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
